text: phir is shok ke pashchaat usane tumapar ek shaanti utaaree - ek nidra, jo tumamen se kuchh logon ko gher rahee thee aur kuchh log aise bhee the jinhen apane praanon kee chinta thee. ve allaah ke vishay mein aisa khayaal kar rahe the, jo saty ke sarvatha pratikool, agyaan (kaal) ka khayaal tha. ve kahate the, "in maamalon mein kya hamaara bhee kuchh adhikaar hai?" kah do, "maamale to sabake sab allaah ke (haath mein) hain." ve jo kuchh apane dilon mein chhipae rakhate hai, tumapar zaahir nahin karate. kahate hai, "yadi is maamale mein hamaara bhee kuchh adhikaar hota to ham yahaan maare na jaate." kah do, "yadi tum apane gharon mein bhee hote, to bhee jin logon ka qatl hona tay tha, ve nikalakar apane antim shayan-sthalon kar pahunchakar rahate." aur yah isalie bhee tha ki jo kuchh tumhaare seenon mein hai, allaah use parakh le aur jo kuchh tumhaare dilon mein hai use saaf kar de. aur allaah dilon ka haal bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
